pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# stgfunc### VapourSynth functions and utils
You can find me in the [IEW Discord server](https://discord.gg/qxTxVJGtst), @Setsugennoao#6969.

## How to installInstall `stgfunc` with the following command:```sh$ pip install stgfunc```Or if you want the latest git version, install it with this command:```sh$ pip install git+https://github.com/Setsugennoao/stgfunc.git```
